long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever felt like you've faced a Dementor when you forget your password? Say no more! This magical extension reveals hidden password fields faster than you can say 'Quidditch'. But remember, with great power comes great responsibility. This isn't the 'Elder Wand' of extensions. So use it wisely, or you might find yourself in a duel with 'He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named'. 

This extension reveals hidden password fields.
